p.k: Based on the popular DC Comics/Vertigo series, THE LOSERS is an explosive tale of double cross and revenge, about the members of an elite U.S. Special Forces unit sent into the Bolivian jungle on a search and destroy mission. Set up, betrayed and left for dead, the group makes plans to even the score. Now, they must remain deep undercover while tracking the ruthless enemy who sol d them out. Watchmen's Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Star Trek's ZoÃ« Saldana, Fantastic Four's Chris Evans, The Wire's Idris Elba and St omp the Yard's Columbus Short comprise the team, while acclaimed actor Jason Patric plays their powerful enemy, a CIA agent who' s gone off the rails in this action extravaganza directed by Sylvain White and produced by Joel Silver (The Matrix trilogy) and Oscar winner Akiva Goldsman (I Am Legend).
